}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_int}}{}%
}}

\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottkw{isValidArgumentTyp} \, \ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{(} \, \ottcomp{\ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}} \, \ottnt{varg}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_function}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXstructure}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXconstXXsext}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\ottpremise{ ( \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <  \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ) }%

% defns Jwf_operand
% defn wf_operand
\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXoperandXXintro}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{insn} \, \in \, \ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  b}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{getInsnOperands} \, \ottnt{insn}  =  \mathit{\{id\} }}%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{id'}  \in  \mathit{\{id\} } }%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{lookupBlockViaIDFromFdef} \, \ottnt{fdef} \, \ottmv{id'}  =  b'}%
\ottpremise{ \neg  \ottkw{isPhiNode} \, \ottnt{insn} }%
\ottpremise{ (   \ottkw{insnDominates} \, \ottmv{id'} \, \ottnt{insn} \, b  \vee  \ottkw{blockStrictDominates} \, \ottnt{fdef} \, b' \, b   \vee   (  \neg   ( \ottkw{isReachableFromEntry} \, \ottnt{fdef} \, b \!)   \!)   \!) }%
}{
\ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  b  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{insn}  \vdash  \ottmv{id'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_operand\_intro}}{}%
}}

\ottpremise{ \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{void}  \vee  \ottkw{isFirstClassTyp} \, \ottnt{typ} }%
\ottpremise{  (  \neg  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{metadata}  \!)   \vee  \ottkw{isCallInsn} \, \ottnt{insn} }%
\ottpremise{  ( \ottkw{isPointerTyp} \, \ottnt{typ} \!)   \mathit{implies}   (  \ottkw{getPointerEltTyp} \, \ottnt{typ}  =  \ottnt{typ'}  \wedge   (  \neg  \ottnt{typ'}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{metadata}  \!)   \!)  }%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{getInsnOperands} \, \ottnt{insn}  =  \mathit{\{id\} }}%
\ottpremise{\mathit{\{id\} }  <-> \, \ottcomp{\ottmv{id_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  b  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{insn}  \vdash  \ottmv{id_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
}{

% defn wf_prod
\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXglobalXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-g}  \ottnt{gvar}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-v}  \ottnt{gvar}}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash  \ottnt{gvar}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_prod\_global\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXfunctionXXdec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-g}  \ottnt{fdec}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash_{f}  \ottnt{fdec}}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash  \ottnt{fdec}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_prod\_function\_dec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXfunctionXXdef}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-g}  \ottnt{fdef}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash_{f}  \ottnt{fdef}}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash  \ottnt{fdef}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_prod\_function\_def}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnwfXXprod}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash  prod$}{\ottcom{$prod$ is well-formed w.r.t. $mod$ $\ottnt{system}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXglobalXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXfunctionXXdec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXfunctionXXdef{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJwfXXprod}{

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXprodsXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash  prod}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash  prod  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{\overline{prod} }}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_prods\_cons}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnwfXXprods}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  mod  \vdash  \mathit{\overline{prod} }$}{\ottcom{$\mathit{\overline{prod} }$ is well-formed w.r.t. $mod$ $\ottnt{system}$}}

\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{layout} } \, \mathit{\overline{namedt} } \, \mathit{\overline{prod} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \mathit{\overline{prod} }}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{layout} } \, \mathit{\overline{namedt} } \, \mathit{\overline{prod} }  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_module\_intro}}{}%
}}
